description:
It sucks to be stuck with an old laptop that can’t keep up anymore, but it also sucks to be cash-strapped enough that upgrading feels out of the question. But hear me out: if you don’t need on-the-go portability, then you can get a fantastic daily driver machine for pretty darn cheap. What you need is a teeny-tiny mini PC. Trust me on this!

Right now, Amazon is selling the Beelink SER5 mini PC for just $279 with this Prime-exclusive deal. But don’t let that “exclusivity” deter you! You can still score this low price simply by signing up for a 30-day free trial of Prime, granting access to all kinds of deals like this one—and this mini PC is an excellent one that’s totally worth it at this price.
title: Get this Ryzen mini PC for just $279 before looming price hikes hit
